resources.string:
Credits:

Developer: Roel Blaauwgeers
B210K hack: Peter Bindels
Brisk five-minute warmup walk. Then do four repetitions of the following:\n- Jog 10 minutes\n- Walk 60 seconds
Brisk five-minute warmup walk. Then do three repetitions of the following:\n- Jog 15 minutes\n- Walk 60 seconds
Brisk five-minute warmup walk. Then do three repetitions of the following:\n- Jog 17 minutes\n- Walk 60 seconds
Brisk five-minute warmup walk. Then do three repetitions of the following:\n- Jog 18 minutes\n- Walk 60 seconds

Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then:
- Jog 22 minutes
- Walk 1 minute
- Jog 22 minutes

Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then:
- Jog 25 minutes
- Walk 1 minute
- Jog 25 minutes

Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then:
- Jog 30 minutes
- Walk 1 minute
- Jog 30 minutes
Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then jog 60 minutes.
